title: ImportError: cannot import name 'imresize'
body:
**My Operating system and DeepLabCut version**
win10, with an Anaconda Env, &Deeplabcut2.0.8

**Describe the problem**
I'm installing this wonderful project. But when I have installed all dependencies and import deeeplabcut for installtion test. I encounter a mistake.Like this:

ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-2-cfa4f159dfc5> in <module>
----> 1 import deeplabcut

D:\Anaconda\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut-2.0.8-py3.6.egg\deeplabcut\__init__.py in <module>
     27     else:
     28         mpl.use('Agg')
---> 29     from deeplabcut import generate_training_dataset
     30     from deeplabcut import refine_training_dataset
     31     from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset import label_frames, dropannotationfileentriesduetodeletedimages, comparevideolistsanddatafolders

D:\Anaconda\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut-2.0.8-py3.6.egg\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\__init__.py in <module>
     17 else:
     18     from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.auxfun_drag_label import *
---> 19     from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.labeling_toolbox import *
     20     from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.multiple_individual_labeling_toolbox import *
     21     from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.frame_extraction_toolbox import *

D:\Anaconda\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut-2.0.8-py3.6.egg\deeplabcut\generate_training_dataset\labeling_toolbox.py in <module>

     26 from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset import auxfun_drag_label
---> 27 from deeplabcut.utils import auxiliaryfunctions
     28 from matplotlib.backends.backend_wxagg import FigureCanvasWxAgg as FigureCanvas
     29 from matplotlib.backends.backend_wxagg import NavigationToolbar2WxAgg as NavigationToolbar

D:\Anaconda\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut-2.0.8-py3.6.egg\deeplabcut\utils\__init__.py in <module>
----> 1 from deeplabcut.utils.make_labeled_video import *
      2 from deeplabcut.utils.auxiliaryfunctions import *
      3 from deeplabcut.utils.video_processor import *
      4 from deeplabcut.utils.plotting import *
      5 

D:\Anaconda\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut-2.0.8-py3.6.egg\deeplabcut\utils\make_labeled_video.py in <module>

     37 from deeplabcut.utils import auxiliaryfunctions
---> 38 from deeplabcut.pose_estimation_tensorflow.config import load_config
     39 from skimage.util import img_as_ubyte
     40 from skimage.draw import circle_perimeter, circle, line,line_aa

D:\Anaconda\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut-2.0.8-py3.6.egg\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\__init__.py in <module>
     12 from deeplabcut.pose_estimation_tensorflow.models import *
     13 from deeplabcut.pose_estimation_tensorflow.nnet import *
---> 14 from deeplabcut.pose_estimation_tensorflow.util import *
     15 
     16 from deeplabcut.pose_estimation_tensorflow.config import *

D:\Anaconda\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut-2.0.8-py3.6.egg\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\util\__init__.py in <module>
     10     pass
     11 else:
---> 12     from deeplabcut.pose_estimation_tensorflow.util.visualize import *

D:\Anaconda\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut-2.0.8-py3.6.egg\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\util\visualize.py in <module>
      6 import math, os
      7 import numpy as np
----> 8 from scipy.misc import imresize
      9 
     10 import matplotlib

ImportError: cannot import name 'imresize'

It tells me it can't import name 'imresize'. Please help me and tell me how to handle this. Thanks!
